ygData.messageBody:
Raean Bloodyhands,
Level 27

Ear: +3 str earring
Ear: +3 str earring
Neck: spiked collar
Face: splitpaw mask
Head: mesh cap
Finger: jagged band
Finger: jagged band
Wrist: serp bracer (going to look for Silver plated soon)
Wrist: serp bracer (possibly replacing with erollisi)
Arm: cured silk
Hands: Wu's Fighting Guantlets (replaced with Treant Fists soon if the
bloody alchemist in Beholder ever spawns.... <sigh>)
Shoulders: cured silk
Chest: foreman's tunic
Back: cured silk cloak
Waist: purity belt

Shoes: cured silk
